problem.markdown: >>Which of the following are benefits of solar generated electricity?<< Choose the TWO characteristics that apply. [x] it does not require a fossil fuel to operate [ ] the production of solar panels does not require much energy [x] once panels are produced, they do not generate waste byproducts [ ] panel production does not require mining or extraction of natural resources [ ] panels provide a reliable, continuous supply of electricity [explanation] While solar panels are energy-intensive to produce (they require mining for certain metals as well as fossil fuels), after production, there is little waste generated during operation. They only produce electricity when the sun is shining. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are benefits of solar generated electricity? Choose the TWO characteristics that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following are benefits of solar generated electricity?
checkboxgroup.choice: it does not require a fossil fuel to operate
the production of solar panels does not require much energy
once panels are produced, they do not generate waste byproducts
panel production does not require mining or extraction of natural resources
panels provide a reliable, continuous supply of electricity

div.p: While solar panels are energy-intensive to produce (they require mining for certain metals as well as fossil fuels), after production, there is little waste generated during operation. They only produce electricity when the sun is shining.
